pizza.endpoint

Class PizzaClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizza.endpoint.PizzaClient

  • public class PizzaClient
extends java.lang.Object
    User agent for the Pizza protocol. Connects to a PizzaServer and requests a menu, then transmits the PizzaOrder message to the server and receives the PizzaConfirmationMessage response.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.net.Socket connection
      Represents the connection to the PizzaServer

    • Constructor Summary

      Connect to the server using a hostname

    • Constructor Detail

      • PizzaClient

        public PizzaClient(java.lang.String hostname)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect to the server using a hostname
        Parameters:
        hostname - hostname on which server resides, or textual representation of the raw IP address
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Connects to a remote PizzaServer and requests a menu which is displayed to the user. Collects user input and composes this into a PizzaOrder message. Finally, transmits the PizzaOrder message to the server and receives the PizzaConfirmationMessage response which is displayed to the user.
        Error behavior: Quits with an error message on wrong number of args, hostname does not resolve to an IP address, or no running PizzaServer at remote host..
        Parameters:
        args - should have one element 'hostname', a host name that is recognized by the local DNS system.
